root_causes.description: AR exceptions totaling $2.6M indicate significant data integrity issues, likely due to incomplete or inaccurate transaction postings.
Bank duplicates (13 instances) suggest inadequate reconciliation controls or duplicate transaction entries.
root_causes.financial_impact: Potential misstatements in cash balances and reconciliation delays

remediations.action: Perform a detailed review of AR transaction postings to identify missing or incorrect entries. Implement automated validation checks for transaction completeness and accuracy.
remediations.success_criteria: Reduction in AR exceptions below materiality thresholds (<$50K or <10 items)

remediations.action: Enhance bank reconciliation processes by implementing duplicate detection algorithms and stricter approval workflows for transaction entries.
remediations.success_criteria: Elimination of duplicate transactions in bank reconciliation reports
